thread.title_full: Listen to Ryan Adams Play “Who Said It: Donald Trump or Morrissey?” on Beats 1

author: Pitchfork
title: Listen to Ryan Adams Play “Who Said It: Donald Trump or Morrissey?” on Beats 1
text:
Listen to Ryan Adams Play “Who Said It: Donald Trump or Morrissey?” on Beats 1 The first episode of his show “The Midnight Wave” also features an improvised song Ryan Adams Photo by: Andrew Lipovsky/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images 
Ryan Adams ’ inaugural episode of his Beats 1 radio show “The Midnight Wave” aired last night, and featured music selections from the singer-songwriter as well as discussions between Adams and his friends Todd, Marshall, Charlie, and Robox about various topics. The group play a game of “Who Said It: Trump or Morrissey?”, talk about what “taking an L” means, and even write a song on the spot. Check out the full episode here and watch a trailer for the show below. Adams recently released Prisoner . Artists In This Story
